mapper.sql: ID, AD_CLIENT_ID, AD_ORG_ID, OWNERID, CREATIONDATE, MODIFIERID, MODIFIEDDATE, ISACTIVE, M_DIM_NEW11_ID, M_DIM_NEW12_ID, M_DIM_NEW13_ID, M_DIM_NEW14_ID, M_DIM_NEW15_ID, M_DIM_NEW16_ID, M_DIM_NEW17_ID, M_DIM_NEW18_ID, M_DIM_NEW19_ID, M_DIM_NEW22_ID, M_DIM_NEW25_ID, M_DIM_NEW26_ID, M_DIM_NEW28_ID, M_DIM_NEW10_ID, M_DIM_NEW32_ID, M_DIM_NEW37_ID, M_DIM_NEW38_ID, M_DIM_NEW39_ID, M_DIM_NEW1_ID, M_DIM_NEW3_ID, M_DIM_NEW4_ID, M_DIM_NEW6_ID, M_DIM_NEW7_ID, M_DIM_NEW41_ID, M_DIM_NEW9_ID, YC_VALUE, JK_VALUE, XC_VALUE, XBC_VALUE, LING_CC_VALUE, LBCC_VALUE, XBCC_VALUE, XKCC_VALUE, DKSL_VALUE, HZXC_VALUE, HZXC1_VALUE, DC1_VALUE, DC_VALUE, MJK_VALUE, MJC_VALUE, QTXX_VALUE, QTJX_VALUE, LING_NUMBER2_VALUE, LING_NUMBER1_VALUE, LING_VALUE, QTXBZZ_VALUE, LXSX5_VALUE, LXSX2_VALUE, LXSX1_VALUE, LXSX4_VALUE, LXSX3_VALUE, QTLB_VALUE, QTXB_VALUE, QTXK_VALUE, DK_VALUE, QTMJ_VALUE, AMJ_VALUE, COLORARR, DK_NUMBER, COLORARR_DES, JZ_VALUE, HUAX, TANGZ, ISAPPROVE, COLORVALUE, PDT, JGNO, CUSTOMER, GH_PRICE1, GH_PRICE, FD_RATE, JL_PRICE, JX_TXT, X_TXT, L_TXT, SY_TXT, XB_TXT, XK_TXT, NO, CZ_DATE, FH_DATE, REMARK, MOBILE, LS_PRICE, LS_PRICE1, FD_RATE1, IS_MORE, XF_TYPE, XF_VALUE, M_DIM_NEW9_ID1, QTXX_VALUE1, M_DIM_NEW9_ID2, QTXX_VALUE2, HK_TXT, ZK_TXT, HHK_TXT, HZK_TXT, XF_TXT, GJ_TXT, QTLINGOTHER, XW_VALUE, SC_ISDC, SEP_LING, JXW_VALUE, SJXC_VALUE, XX_TXT, D_TXT, HD_TXT, Z_TXT, KOUD, FUJ, TESGY, M_PRODUCT_ID, XB_VALUE, XBZZ_VALUE, C_CUSTOMER_ID, DOCNO, SH_REMARK, NO1, EXPRESSTYPE, DCTIME, NOERID, NOTIME

SELECT t1.ID, t1.NO1, t1.PDT, t1.CUSTOMER, t1.CZ_DATE as czDate, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE t1.M_DIM_NEW12_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW12' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew12Text, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE t1.M_DIM_NEW15_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW15' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew15Text, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE t1.M_DIM_NEW16_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW16' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew16Text, (SELECT t2.ATTRIBNAME FROM M_DIM_NEW t2 WHERE t1.M_DIM_NEW17_ID = t2.id and t2.DIMFLAG='DIMFLAG_NEW17' and t2.ISACTIVE = 'Y') as mDimNew17Text, t1.XW_VALUE as xwValue, t1.YC_VALUE as ycValue, 1 as sum, NVL(1 * t1.ls_price,0) as totalAmount, t3.IMGURL1 as imgUrl, t4.name as colorName from v_m_product_approve t1 LEFT JOIN M_PRODUCT t2 on t2.NAME = t1.PDT LEFT JOIN B_PDT_MEDIA t3 on t3.M_PRODUCT_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN M_COLOR t4 on t4.id = t1.COLORVALUE WHERE t1.ISACTIVE = 'Y'
ORDER BY t1.CZ_DATE DESC,t1.NO1 DESC

SELECT t1.ID, t1.NO1, t1.PDT, t1.CUSTOMER, t1.CZ_DATE as czDate, t1.XW_VALUE as xwValue, t1.YC_VALUE as ycValue, t1.SUM as sum, t1.TOTALAMOUNT as totalAmount, t3.IMGURL1 as imgUrl from V_M_PRODUCT_APPROVE_GROUP t1 LEFT JOIN M_PRODUCT t2 on t2.NAME = t1.PDT LEFT JOIN B_PDT_MEDIA t3 on t3.M_PRODUCT_ID = t2.ID WHERE t1.ISACTIVE = 'Y'
ORDER BY t1.CZ_DATE DESC
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from v_m_product_approve t1 WHERE t1.ISACTIVE = 'Y'
SELECT count(1) from v_m_product_approve_group t1 WHERE t1.ISACTIVE = 'Y'

mapper.update: update M_PRODUCT_APPROVE t set t.ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR} where t.M_PRODUCT_APPROVE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
